DOC.brief_title: Study Biomarker From Blood Tissue Head Neck Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Head neck malignant tumor , especially nasopharyngeal carcinoma southern China high incidence , incidence , treatment , prognosis tumor marker serum hot research little progress.In study , collect NPC-based collection include blood sample laryngeal , hypopharyngeal cancer , separate serum white blood cell store -80 degrees，while tissue freeze liquid nitrogen embed paraffin。 Patient treatment prognosis combine order find marker molecular biology use early diagnosis , predict prognosis sensitive chemotherapy radiotherapy .
DOC.criteria: nasopharyngeal carcinoma hypopharyngeal carcinoma laryngeal carcinoma visit ENT department NanFang hospital patient whose anticipated survival duration le 6 month
